description.displayText: Our family just arrived in New York. As our kids only speak French, I posted a job on care.com for a fluent French and fluent English and received tens of applications, interviewed many as well. When my husband and I met Nogaye, we immediately knew she would be a great caregiver and we were right. We asked her right away to care for our two little boys, aged 3 months and 2 years old as we felt she was so experienced and professional. Nogaye is a very smart woman on whom you can rely to handle your house as if it was hers, discreet but in charge. She immediately won over the two little ones, and this although the smallest one requested a lot of attention. She clearly knows about children psychology and newborn nursering. She would ask me about our customs and immediately fit in. Always super punctual and available, even when we asked her for long days when we were moving. Singing little songs to the newborn, this one could not stop smiling. Definitely a great nanny ! Our family will come over and help with the kids, this is why we have to let Nogaye go. Don't miss her - she is one of a kind.

description.displayText: Nogaye is a great caregiver and teacher for our 2 year old daughter. She is very energetic and fun to be around. She is great in keeping our toddler always very busy by bringing her to the library, sing-a-long events, dance classes, the museum, the botanical garden and by being proactive in organizing play dates either at the playground/parks or indoors. Our daughter loves her.
description.originalText: Nogaye is a great caregiver and teacher for our 2 year old daughter. She is very energetic and fun to be around. She is great in keeping our toddler always very busy by bringing her to the library, sing-a-long events, dance classes, the museum, the botanical garden and by being proactive in organizing play dates either at the playground/parks or indoors. Our daughter loves her.

description.displayText:
It is my pleasure to recommend Nogaye   as a Nanny/Housekeeper. Nogaye was our nanny/housekeeper for 5 years  She worked full time usually around 55 hours a week. She was taking care of our kids and  also did housework, ran errands and took the kids to appointments and outings. Nogaye has become and will remain part of our family; my kids adore her and her children, as do my husband and I.

Nogaye developed a strong bond with each child, but very much respected our role as parents.

Nogaye is very reliable.  I can   not remember many times over the years that she was not able to come to work. Many times when she was not feeling well she would still be at our house taking care of our kids. Nogaye always tried to make our life simpler and would keep the kids at nights and on weekends, sometimes without charge, so that my husband and I could spend time together.

Nogayeis extremely trustworthy; I never worried about the safety of my children when they were with her. She was always patient with my children and I can not remember one time in her years with us that I saw her lose her cool. She always respected the children, yet was able to discipline them appropriately when needed.

I recommend Nogaye with full confidence. She is an outstanding nanny/housekeeper and person.

description.displayText: Nogaye was a wonderful French/English Nanny to our daughter. For one year Nogaye cared for our daughter full time. She did everything from the basics, diapers, feeding and cleaning, to teaching French an English while playing inside and outdoors. Nogaye is full of energy to keep up with the wildest child or inspire one's a bit more reserved. They were always going outside and to different places for fun, learning and playgroups. Nogaye is very skilled with children with separation anxiety and really understands what the child needs. Additionally, her studies in Child Development make her an excellent care giver. Nogaye treats my daughter as her own, and my daughter has grown very attached to Nogaye. - even asking for her on the weekends.
